channel.title: Exp changing
channel.description: can any one tell my how to change the exp per hit on a 317

item.title: Exp changing
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“DemonsworldOwner, post:2, topic:335405”]I can, serch this, and keep doing it till you cant serch it anymore, and change the x(number) to the xp u want:)
TotalExp = (double)[/quote]

Here’s my code:

double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(500hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(500hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(500hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

Hmm i still get 120 exp per hit, any thoughts?

Read full topic

item.title: Exp changing
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“brian9612, post:5, topic:335405”][quote author=DemonsworldOwner link=topic=431791.msg3169551#msg3169551 date=1270324799]

thanks but i also want it for skills like mining and smithing

Keep serching that same thing, and youll come up to alot of differnert ones, it changes them to everything
[/quote]
i have already done that but it still dont work[/quote]Alright to change them for mining and such first of all I’ll do mining
}
public void ironmine(){
if(playerLevel[14] >= 20){
sendMessage(“You mine some iron ore!”);
addItem(440, 1);
addSkillXP((25*playerLevel[14]), 14);
setAnimation(625);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 20 mining!”);
}

This would be my ironmine method you see if(playerLever[14] >= 20( that 20 is the level required to mine it you see the addSkillXP((25playerLevel[14]), 14); that 25 is the exp that mining the iron would give you, change it to what you like save and compile you can do this for the others as well as I’ve provided you with the easy steps remember CTRL+F are your friends

Read full topic
